article_title: Ceasefire talks have completely stalled, Palestinian official tells BBC.
sentence: According  to  our  correspondent,  the  official  said  the  Hamas  delegation  withdrew  after  presenting  what  they  claimed  were  all  the  necessary  proposals  to  reach  an  agreement,  including  the  potential  handing  over  of  more  civilian  hostages  and  the  bodies  of  two  children  killed  in  an  Israeli  air  strike.
